name: Download Speed
description:
Run to the user's computer before time runs out and the download fails! To get faster, you'll have to pay with your time.

This game was made for Jame Gam 18 and followed the theme "Time is Money". The jam also suggested "Clip" as a special object. Well, meet Blippy!

This game supports gamepad and has been tested with Switch Pro and PS4 controllers. Plug in, move with left stick, and try all your face buttons!
